title: Working mothers
itunes:title: Working mothers
itunes:subtitle: Helen McCarthy considers how women in Britain have sought to balance the demands of work and childcare over the past century. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Helen McCarthy, author of the new book Double Lives, considers how women in Britain have sought to balance the demands of work and childcare over the past century. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
